diagnostic_cases.title: Chest X-Ray - Pneumonia Detection
diagnostic_cases.description: 45-year-old patient with fever, cough, and difficulty breathing
diagnostic_cases.expected_findings: Consolidation in right lower lobe consistent with bacterial pneumonia. Increased opacity and air bronchograms visible.

diagnostic_cases.title: Retinal Scan - Diabetic Retinopathy
diagnostic_cases.expected_findings: Microaneurysms and hard exudates present. Moderate non-proliferative diabetic retinopathy detected.

diagnostic_cases.title: X-Ray - Wrist Fracture
diagnostic_cases.description: 28-year-old patient after fall, wrist pain and swelling
diagnostic_cases.expected_findings: Distal radius fracture (Colles' fracture) with dorsal angulation. No displacement noted.

treatment_cases.title: Hypertension with Diabetes
treatment_cases.expected_warnings: Drug interaction check required. ACE inhibitors preferred for diabetic patients.

treatment_cases.title: Acute Asthma Exacerbation
treatment_cases.expected_warnings: Avoid NSAIDs. Consider oral corticosteroids for severe exacerbation.
